definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="gui_get_value_checkbox"><field name="checkbox">SleepingPodRadioactiveProtection</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:has_radioactivity_protection</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="entity_set_health" x="76" y="240"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="health"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value></block><block type="logic_binary_ops" x="111" y="325"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="B"><block type="damagesource_isequalto"><field name="damagetype">CUSTOM:RadioactiveWaterDamage</field><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></xml>
